section.heading: Establishment of licensing periods by Mayor; prorating for late application.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: “This act”, referred to in the first sentence of this section, is 32 Stat. 590, ch. 1352, approved July 1, 1902.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 12-261, title II, § 2003(pp)(6) ( 46 DCR 3142), eff. April 20, 1999, amends § 47-2805 without reference to its prior repeal by D.C. Law 12-86.
